name: roomdb
description: A Datalog-style database that enables programmers to represent facts in natural language.
author: Alex Warth <alexwarth@gmail.com> (http://alexwarth.com)

scripts.build-web: node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/roomdb-web.js -s roomdb -o dist/roomdb-web.js && node node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs dist/roomdb-web.js > dist/roomdb-web.min.js
